reviewText: Showed this at the Polyglot Gathering in Berlin (a convention for people who love to learn languages) - everyone was laughing so hard! Loved it!
The portrayal of Esperanto was disappointing, an esperantist antagonist seems very unlikely... Let's hope negative publicity is still good publicity.
Interesting to any conlanger, but remarkably brief. Far more could have been done via the backgrounds and interactions of the other characters involved in the story.
